RelatedSentence: State Enterprise Workers ' Relations Confederation secretary - general Komsan Thongsiri said on Sunday after a meeting with People 's Democratic Reform Committee secretary - general Suthep Thaugsuban that all state enterprise employees would begin a five - day work stoppage from May 22 in support of the PDRC 's campaign for the ouster of the Thaksin regime and government officials serving it .

State Enterprise Workers ' Relations Confederation secretary - general Komsan Thongsiri said on Sunday after a meeting with People 's Democratic Reform Committee secretary - general Suthep Thaugsuban that all state enterprise employees would begin a five - day work stoppage from May 22 in support of the PDRC 's campaign for the ouster of the Thaksin regime and government officials serving it .
Mr Soonchai said he was sure all staff at Egat , a state enterprise with offices and employees throughout the country , would work as usual and continue to serve the people .
